card.title: Attendance at the National Assembly sessions

info.lead: MP's attendance at the National Assembly sessions compared to average and maximum value.
info.text: We count all the sessions and check whether the MP voted at least once during an individual session. If they voted at least once we count them as present at the individual session. We divide the number of sessions where the MP was present with the number of all sessions and normalise the number (min 1 - max 100).
